titleStmt.title: The happines of peace and vnitie dedicated to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, and humbly presented to the Honorable House of Commons, for their incouragement to the perfection of that good worke of peace and vnion in the church and state / by E.W. Gent.
titleStmt.author: E. W., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
